Class
I am old enough to receive training as a warrior or mage.
Class
It is time to decide what kind of combat or magical training my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] should receive.
[From.GetHerHisCap] talents are like [From.GetHerHis] father's.
[From.GetHerHisCap] talents are like [From.GetHerHis] mother's.
[From.GetSheHeCap] should be trained like any other solider in the army.
[From.GetSheHeCap] will not receive special training.
[From.GetFirstName] will be assigned a class in [From.GetHerHis] father's class set.

Promotion

You have become quite experienced in your class and you feel that your skills have reached a new level.\n\nPerhaps it's time to learn a new style of combat, or work on mastering what you already know?
I will be a peerless knight.
I will fight for justice!
None will match my skill with the bow.
I will master all fields of combat.
I will crush skulls in a single blow.
My life is dedicated to the sword.
I will be a master thief.
My pegasus and I will fight as one.
My wyvern and I will fight as one.
My sacred magic will aid my allies.
I will master anima magic.
I will master the dark arts.
I must balance defense and mobility.
I will battle with sword and bow.
I will be the strongest of all fighters!
I will master the killing arts.
I will pierce any defense.
I will wield magic from horseback.
Enlightenment is within reach...
I will learn the summoning arts.
I am already great!
I'm not ready to change anything.
Your latest victory has given you valuable experience. You've definitely grown stronger!
